s.text: If any of us at the dental school can be of assistance, please write or call.
Like all other dental schools, Indiana University School of Dentistry is carefully re-evaluating its programs and planning ways to better serve the dental community.
Like all other dental schools, Indiana University School of Dentistry is carefully re-evaluating its programs and planning ways to better serve the dental community.
As you know, major changes in dental education are under way throughout the country.
